DataElement.preferredDefinition: The start date of the clinical event represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to clinical events._The calendar date on which something is to start or did start.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.21.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the [clinical event] start date?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the start date of the [clinical event ] using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CESTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable CESTDTC in ISO 8601 format.
